subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Cardiomyopathy Health Education, Awareness, Research, and Training in the Schools Act of 2017 or HEARTS Act of 2017

This bill establishes a series of programs and requirements relating to cardiomyopathy, including school awareness campaigns and research initiatives.

titles.title: Cardiomyopathy Health Education, Awareness, Research, and Training in the Schools Act of 2017

To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize and support the creation and dissemination of cardiomyopathy education, awareness, and risk assessment materials and resources to identify more at-risk families, to authorize research and surveillance activities relating to cardiomyopathy, and for other purposes.
